Text.Page:
The wendigos' chieftain is no friend to the federation.

We need to keep the wendigos unorganized and out of our way. Kill Kalmatcha. With luck, any wendigos not dominated will be distracted by the struggle to name a new chieftain.

Kalmatcha had no nobility, unlike other wendigos I've heard of. His death is no great loss to their tribe, much less ours.

Now we can focus on our real enemies.
